recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi Keuangan Dan Perbankan, Administrasi Keuangan, Manajemen Administrasi Perkantoran (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Managing the finances of the Marketing & PND division.
2. Preparing financial reports per division.
3. Drafting fund request letters (for projects as well as overhead).
4. Drafting goods and services request letters (for projects as well as overhead).
5. Managing documents and archives.
6. Serving internal and external needs.
7. Organizing schedules and agendas.
8. Coordinating between divisions.
9. Supporting the smooth daily operations of the division.
